duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain an effective Quality Management System (QMS) that complies with all applicable regulations and standards.
Establish and maintain robust quality assurance programs to ensure safety, reliability, and effectiveness of medical devices.
Collaborate with the procurement team to evaluate and select suppliers/vendors based on their quality management capabilities.
Lead and facilitate risk management activities, including the identification, assessment, and mitigation of risks associated with product quality.
Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to the quality team, ensuring their professional growth and development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field (e.g., engineering, life sciences) is required. Advanced certifications (e.g., ASQ-CQE, ASQ-CQA, RAC) are highly desirable.
